title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, could you please provide some clarification on what the error message means?
OB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), some error message is displayed. It is not clear what the error message means.
EB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), the expected behavior should be to display the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Additionally, the error message displayed should provide a clear explanation of the issue.
SR: To reproduce the issue, try hitting F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant) and observe the displayed error message.
